content: उदंच् {c1c} <ab>U.</ab> [उद्-अंच्] {@--1@} To raise, elevate, lift or throw up, draw up (as water); एकैकमेव पादमुदच्य तिष्ठति अश्वः <ls>Śat. Br.</ls>; उदंचिताक्षः <ls>Bk. 2. 31</ls>; उदंचय मुखं मनाक् <ls>Vb. 3. 27.</ls> {@--2@} To utter, send forth, cause to sound; हरिमनुगायति काचिदुदंचितपंचमरागं <ls>Gīt. 1.</ls> {@--3@} (Intrans.) ({%a%}) To go up; ({%b%}) to rise, rise forth; उदंचन्मात्सर्य <ls>G. L. 6</ls>; <ls>Bv. 2. 76</ls>; <ls>K. 221</ls>; welter up; <ls>Mv. 3. 32.</ls>

उदच्, उदंच् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} ({%<ab>m.</ab>%}|उदङ्|{%<ab>n.</ab>%}|उदक्|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}|उदीची) {@--1@} Turned or going upwards. {@--2@} Upper, higher; °कूलः, °तीरः &c. {@--3@} Northern, turned towards the north. {@--4@} Subsequent. --क {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Above. {@--2@} Northward, to the north of (with <ab>abl.</ab>); <ls>Ms. 3. 217.</ls> {@--3@} Subsequently.
